Name: SASE x ABSA APAMSA Diwali Celebration
Location:
Busch Hall
2036 Neil Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join SASE, ABSA, and APAMSA for a vibrant Diwali celebration! Experience the Festival of Lights with traditional Indian food, exciting games, and beautiful henna art. This collaborative cultural event brings together multiple student organizations to share in the joy and traditions of Diwali. Come celebrate with us and learn about this important cultural festival while enjoying great company and activities.

Name: Tea Night
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join SASE for a night of relaxation and conversation with tea and snacks. This is a great opportunity to unwind and connect with fellow SASE members and friends. No need to bring anything, just come enjoy the company and conversation.

Name: Jobs in Energy w/ First Energy
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join First Energy to learn about career opportunities in the energy sector and see demonstrations of essential safety practices in power distribution. Food will be provided.
